channel.title: Presso Therapy – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: PressCare G 300
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Ideal for: drainage - swollen legs and arms - water retention - cellulite - massages - heavy limbs
Model with 3 programs of the new Globus pressotherapy line, suitable for wellness, beauty and relaxation needs. PressCare G300 is a lightweight and portable device that offers professional services. Mode A: according to the sequence of the program there will be an inflation and deflation of the boot one sector at a time, from the distal (foot or hand) toward the proximal part. Mode B: according to the sequence of the program there will be an inflation of two chambers at a time, simulating the function of the overlap boots. Mode C: the sequence of the program starts pressure from the feet and maintaining previous chambers inflated until the whole leg (or arm or abdomen) is inflated up to the groin.
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
– 3 programs
– Pressure: 0~180mmHg±10%
– Timer up to 99 minutes
– Weight 2.4 kg
– Size: 185x140x190 mm

ACCESSORIES ON DEMAND
– Battery kit
– sleeve, boot, abdominal/gluteus band
– boot/sleeve circumference extension
